data.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 3 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Finally, a way for everyone to enjoy all of the music featured in The Jackbox Party Pack 3, without all of that pesky gameplay, graphics or interactivity! We've suffered long and hard for our music -- now it's your turn.

Credits

Music for Fakin' It, Quiplash 2 and Trivia Murder Party* by Andy Poland

Music for Guesspionage and Tee K.O. by Brian Chard

"List of the Dead Song" by Randy Sly
